Module main.project
Package controller

Class ModifyProductForm

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Huy G To The ModifyProductForm class allows a selected product from the main menu to be modified, this means changing its associated parts, removing any associated parts, and modifying and parameters of the product.
